verses.verse: (For the choir director; <S%H7682>[set<s%> to] Al-tashheth. A Mikhtam of David, when Saul) (sent [men,] and they watched the house in order to kill him.) <S%H5337>Deliver<s%> me from my <S%H340>enemies,<s%> O my <S%H430>God;<s%> Set me [securely] on <S%H7682>high<s%> away from those who <S%H6965>rise<s%> up against me.
<S%H5337>Deliver<s%> me from those who <S%H6466>do<s%> <S%H205>iniquity,<s%> And <S%H3467>save<s%> me from <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H1818>bloodshed.<s%>

For <S%H2009>behold,<s%> they have <S%H693>set<s%> an <S%H693>ambush<s%> for my <S%H5315>life;<s%> <S%H5794>Fierce<s%> <S%H5794>men<s%> <S%H9075>launch<s%> an <S%H9075>attack<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me, Not for my <S%H6588>transgression<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> for my <S%H9128>sin,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%>
For <S%H1097>no<s%> <S%H5771>guilt<s%> of [mine], they <S%H7323>run<s%> and <S%H3559>set<s%> themselves against me. <S%H5782>Arouse<s%> Thyself to <S%H7122>help<s%> me, and <S%H7200>see!<s%>

And Thou, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H9516>Awake<s%> to <S%H6485>punish<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations;<s%> Do not be <S%H2603>gracious<s%> to <S%H3605>any<s%> [who are] <S%H898>treacherous<s%> in <S%H205>iniquity.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
They <S%H7725>return<s%> at <S%H6153>evening,<s%> they <S%H1993>howl<s%> like a <S%H3611>dog,<s%> And <S%H5437>go<s%> <S%H5437>around<s%> the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> they <S%H5042>belch<s%> <S%H5042>forth<s%> with their <S%H6310>mouth;<s%> <S%H2719>Swords<s%> are in their <S%H8193>lips,<s%> For, [they say,] <S%H4310>"Who<s%> <S%H8085>hears<s%>?"
But Thou, O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> dost <S%H7832>laugh<s%> at them; Thou dost <S%H3932>scoff<s%> at <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>
[Because of] his <S%H5797>strength<s%> I will <S%H8104>watch<s%> for Thee, For <S%H430>God<s%> is my <S%H4869>stronghold.<s%>
My <S%H430>God<s%> in His <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> will <S%H6923>meet<s%> me; <S%H430>God<s%> will let me <S%H7200>look<s%> [triumphantly] upon my <S%H9596>foes.<s%>

Do not <S%H2026>slay<s%> them, <S%H6435>lest<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7911>forget;<s%> <S%H5128>Scatter<s%> them by Thy <S%H2428>power,<s%> and <S%H3381>bring<s%> them <S%H3381>down,<s%> O <S%H136>Lord,<s%> our <S%H4043>shield.<s%>

[On <S%H4480>account<s%> of] the <S%H9128>sin<s%> of their <S%H6310>mouth<s%> [and] the <S%H1697>words<s%> of their <S%H8193>lips,<s%> Let them even be <S%H3920>caught<s%> in their <S%H1347>pride,<s%> And on account of <S%H423>curses<s%> and <S%H3585>lies<s%> which they <S%H5608>utter.<s%>

<S%H3615>Destroy<s%> [them] in <S%H2534>wrath,<s%> <S%H3615>destroy<s%> [them], that they may be <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>more;<s%> That [men] may <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H4910>rules<s%> in <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> To the <S%H657>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
And they <S%H7725>return<s%> at <S%H6153>evening,<s%> they <S%H1993>howl<s%> like a <S%H3611>dog,<s%> And <S%H5437>go<s%> <S%H5437>around<s%> the <S%H5892>city.<s%>
They <S%H5128>wander<s%> about for <S%H398>food,<s%> And <S%H9235>growl<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> they are not <S%H7646>satisfied.<s%>

But as for me, I shall <S%H7891>sing<s%> of Thy <S%H5797>strength;<s%> Yes, I shall <S%H7442>joyfully<s%> <S%H7442>sing<s%> of Thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> For Thou hast <S%H1961>been<s%> my <S%H4869>stronghold,<s%> And a <S%H4498>refuge<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of my <S%H9496>distress.<s%>
O my <S%H5797>strength,<s%> I will <S%H2167>sing<s%> <S%H2167>praises<s%> to Thee; For <S%H430>God<s%> is my <S%H4869>stronghold,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> who shows me <S%H2617>lovingkindness.<s%>
